context: Global pharmaceutical company, 12,000 employees, $15B annual revenue, implementing personalized medicine platform for oncology and immunology therapeutic areas

request.purpose: Build integrated personalized medicine platform combining genomic sequencing, AI-driven drug response prediction, and companion diagnostic development
request.justification: Capitalize on $150B precision medicine market opportunity with projected 35% improvement in clinical trial success rates and 40% faster time-to-market for targeted therapies

decision_process.outcome: Approved as core strategic initiative with board-level sponsorship
Strategic partnerships secured with Illumina, Tempus AI, and Flatiron Health
Regulatory strategy developed with FDA breakthrough designation pathway
Pilot demonstrated 45% improvement in treatment response prediction accuracy
Scalable platform developed with SOC 2 Type II compliance
Platform launched with 15 initial pharmaceutical partners

risk_factors: Evolving regulatory landscape for genomic data
strategic_benefits: New revenue streams from companion diagnostics
Improved patient outcomes and market differentiation
